text: Fabrício Ramos Melo (born June 13, 1986) is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Águia de Marabá. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Turkey Category:Association football midfielders Category:Paysandu Sport Club players Category:Sertãozinho Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Desportiva Cabofriense players Category:Bursaspor footballers Category:Boavista Sport Club players Category:Águia de Marabá Futebol Clube players Category:Associação Atlética Anapolina players Category:Paragominas Futebol Clube players Category:Independente Futebol Clube players Category:Tuna Luso Brasileira players Category:Clube do Remo players
title: Fabrício Ramos Melo
